Uses of Class
uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.Marquee

  • Packages that use Marquee 
    Package Description
    uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player
    This is the main package for vlcj client applications, providing the classes necessary to create and control native media players and associated resources.

    • Uses of Marquee in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Marquee Marquee.colour(Color colour)
      Apply the text colour.
      Marquee Marquee.colour(int rgb)
      Apply the text colour as RGB components.
      Marquee Marquee.disable()
      Disable the marquee.
      Marquee Marquee.enable()
      Enable the marquee.
      Marquee Marquee.enable(boolean enable)
      Apply the initial enabled/disabled state.
      Marquee Marquee.location(int x, int y)
      Apply the text location in video co-ordinates.
      static Marquee Marquee.marquee()
      Create a marquee.

      Apply the text opacity.
